sentences.en: But its political antecedents are Scandinavian. Its citizens call themselves Manxmen.
sentences.cn: 其祖先政治上归属斯堪的那维亚,其人民自称马恩克斯人.

sentences.en: Finland along with Iceland is Nordic rather than Scandinavian.
sentences.cn: 芬兰与冰岛是北欧,而不是斯堪的纳维亚.

sentences.en: German, Swiss and Scandinavian designs are quite noticeable, for example.
sentences.cn: 例如:德国的 、 瑞士的和斯堪的那维亚的设计就有明显的特色.

sentences.en: Is it real coffee or some Scandinavian CHristmas potion?
sentences.cn: 是真的咖啡还是一些斯堪的纳维亚的基督药?

sentences.en: Judging from his appearance, I expect that he may be a Scandinavian.
sentences.cn: 从他的外貌看来, 我认为他是斯堪的纳维亚人.

sentences.en: Ken Laird is describing the organization of the Scandinavian savings bank he works for.
sentences.cn: 肯?莱尔德正在介绍他供职的斯堪的纳维亚储蓄银行的组织情况.

sentences.en: Scandinavian Airlines announce the departure of the 12:05 flight SK 526 to Stockholm.
sentences.cn: 斯堪的纳维亚航空公司前往斯德哥尔摩的SK526次班机将于12:05起飞.

sentences.en: Scandinavian Airlines flight number SK 528 boarding gate 4.
sentences.cn: 斯堪的纳维亚航空公司SK528次航班在4号门登机.

sentences.en: Scandinavian dictionary order, case - insensitive, for use with the 850 ( Multilingual ) Character Set.
sentences.cn: 斯堪的纳维亚文字典顺序, 不区分大小写, 用于850 ( 多语言 ) 字符集.

sentences.en: Scandinavian dictionary order, case - sensitive, for use with the 850 ( Multilingual ) Character Set.
sentences.cn: 斯堪的纳维亚文字典顺序, 区分大小写, 用于850 ( 多语言 ) 字符集.
她肯定是斯堪的纳维亚人。

sentences.en: The Baltic republics have called on the Scandinavian countries for help.
sentences.cn: 波罗的海诸共和国已呼吁斯堪的纳维亚诸国提供援助。

sentences.en: This is the latest in a series of shocks to the Scandinavian banking system.
sentences.cn: 这是一系列对斯堪的纳维亚银行系统的冲击中最近的一次。

sentences.en: Very popular Scandinavian blend , pleasing aroma full & long lasting flavor.
sentences.cn: 斯堪的那维亚流行拼配.有沁心的香气 和 持久的香味.

sentences.en: You can very profitably study the events of Scandinavian history.
sentences.cn: 研究斯堪的纳维亚半岛的历史对你很有益处.

trans.tran_cn: 斯堪的纳维亚（人）的，斯堪的纳维亚语的，北欧日耳曼语系的
trans.tran_en: Scandinavian means belonging or relating to a group of northern European countries that includes Denmark, Norway, and Sweden, or to the people, languages, or culture of those countries

trans.tran_cn: 斯堪的纳维亚人，斯堪的纳维亚语，北欧日耳曼语系
trans.tran_en: someone from the area of northern Europe that consists of Norway, Sweden, Denmark, and usually Finland and Iceland
